overview: The Chinese opera film "Bao Qingtian" -- co-produced by Henan Film Company and Hong Kong Golden Horse Film Company -- was filmed in 1980, but not released until 1985. It bears the unique cultural characteristics of the Central Plains, well-known in Hong Kong and Southeast Asia, and features Henan opera stars Zhang Baoying and Wu Xinping.
title: Bao Qingtian
